item.title: Research on Inductive Rumor Detection in Large Graphs via Centrality Measures
item.description:
Recently, fake news spread quickly on the Internet, especially on social media. In order to identify rumor precisely, we would like to study rumor detection on twitter and weibo based on the Graph Convolutional Network model, which could perfectly match with social network structure. By using semi-supervised learning, our model also performs well in early rumor detection.

  • We applied semi-supervised learning on rumor detection by selecting Opinion Leaders through Katz measures and labeling those leaders, realizing early rumor detectionsemi-supervised learning. We trained all labeled and unlabeled data via Graph Convolutional Network models to improve explainability and rationality.
  • We plan to use three real world datasets for training and finish a paper in September.
